sqlMap.select: select * from DOCUMENT order by title
select * from DOCUMENT WHERE deleted = 0 order by title

select * from DOCUMENT WHERE deleted = 0 AND principal = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM VERSION WHERE VERSION.documentId = Document.id AND VERSION.deleted = 0 AND VERSION.status = 'CONSOLIDATED') order by title LIMIT 11

select * from DOCUMENT WHERE deleted = 0 AND principal = 0 and DOCUMENT.typeOne = #typeOne# and DOCUMENT.typeTwo = #typeTwo# AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM VERSION WHERE VERSION.documentId = DOCUMENT.id AND VERSION.deleted = 0 AND VERSION.status = 'CONSOLIDATED') order by title LIMIT 11
select * from DOCUMENT WHERE DOCUMENT.id IN (SELECT documentId FROM VERSION where VERSION.status IN ('IN_NEGOTIATION', 'IN_SIGN'))
select * from DOCUMENT WHERE DELETED = 0 and EXISTS (SELECT * FROM VERSION WHERE VERSION.documentId = DOCUMENT.id AND VERSION.deleted = 0 AND VERSION.status = 'CONSOLIDATED') order by title
select DOCUMENT.* from DOCUMENT where DOCUMENT.principal = 1 and DOCUMENT.deleted = 0 and DOCUMENT.typeOne = #typeOne# and DOCUMENT.typeTwo = #typeTwo#

select DOCUMENT.* from DOCUMENT where DOCUMENT.principal = 1 and DOCUMENT.deleted = 0 and EXISTS (select * from VERSION where VERSION.documentId = DOCUMENT.ID and VERSION.status = 'CONSOLIDATED' and VERSION.deleted = 0)
sqlMap.update: update DOCUMENT set title= #title#, introduction = #introduction#, principal= #principal#, typeOne = #typeOne#, typeTwo = #typeTwo#, deleted = #deleted# where ID = #id#
update DOCUMENT set principal = 0 where principal = 1
update DOCUMENT set principal = 0 where principal = 1 and typeOne = #typeOne# and typeTwo = #typeTwo#
update DOCUMENT set deleted = 1 where ID = #id#
